protein.general_function: Involved in negative regulation of microtubule depolymerization
protein.specific_function: The exact function of MAP2 is unknown but MAPs may stabilize the microtubules against depolymerization. They also seem to have a stiffening effect on microtubules

go_class.description: regulation of microtubule polymerization or depolymerization
negative regulation of microtubule polymerization or depolymerization
